summary:
- **Takeover Bid Update**: Elph Investments' off-market takeover bid for Engenco Limited (ASX:EGN) is now **unconditional**, with all defeating conditions removed.  
- **Current Ownership**: Elph Investments holds **91.74% voting power** in Engenco.  
- **Offer Closure**: The bid is scheduled to close at **7:00pm (Sydney time) on 27 June 2025**, unless extended or withdrawn.  
- **Payment Timeline**: Accepted offers will be paid per the timeframe in Section 9.9 of the Bidder’s Statement.  

(Note: Boilerplate legal/firm details omitted as non-material.)
